00011 int main(int argc, char ** argv) {
00012 
00013     int color_mode = -1;
00014 
00015     if(argc != 2) {
00016         fprintf(stderr, 
00017                 "Usuage: ./snapshot_taker color|gray\n");
00018         return -1;
00019     }
00020     else if(!strcmp(argv[1], "color")) {
00021         color_mode = 1;
00022     }
00023     else if(!strcmp(argv[1], "gray")) {
00024         color_mode = 0;
00025     }
00026     else {
00027         fprintf(stderr, 
00028                 "Usuage: ./snapshot_taker color|gray\n");
00029         return -1;
00030     }
00031 
00032     connect();
00033 
00034     VideoStream video(&robot, color_mode);
00035 
00036     video.startStream();
00037 
00038     int close = 0;
00039     std::string quit;
00040     while(!close) {
00041         std::cout << "Type in E or Exit to quit & Take Picture\n";
00042         std::cin >> quit;
00043         if(quit == "E" || quit == "Exit" || quit == "e" || quit == "exit")
00044             close = 1;
00045     }
00046     PicturePtr pic = robot.takePicture( argv[1] );
00047     pic->savePicture("snapshot.jpg");
00048     video.endStream();
00049     //sleep(5);
00050     //std::cout << "restarting" << std::endl;
00051     //}
00052     disconnect();
00053     return 1;
00054 }
